section.heading: Enforcement of parking meters in Premium Demand Parking Meter Rate Zones.
section.text: As of October 1, 2015, the District Department of Transportation shall provide for enforcement of parking meters in Premium Demand Parking Meter Rate Zones from 7:00 a.m. until midnight.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see ยง 6004 of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).
For temporary (90 days) repeal of section, see ยง 2 of the Fiscal Year 2016 Second Budget Support Clarification Emergency Amendment Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-202, Nov. 23, 2015, 62 DCR 15276).
